name: Write|Publish|SellDailyBriefwithAlexaBigwarfe
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Need tips, tools, or inspiration to help you write, publish, or SELL your book? Suffering from imposter syndrome, self-doubt, or other mindset issues that often plague writers? Hosted by Alexa Bigwarfe, these quick audio bites will help you focus on developing and maintaining a healthy writer mindset, take easy steps to work on the development and growth of your author platform, providing guidance to help you soothe the overwhelm that can be associated with publishing and marketing a book. This podcast for authors provides quick tidbits delivered daily to help you through your self-publishing journey.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
